TextView.android:text: XIAOMI A3 vs REDMI NOTE 9 PRO
MI NOTE 9 PRO (Silver,4 GB) 64 GB ROM

The Xiaomi Redmi Note 9 pro is the latest smartphone from Xiaomi's popular Note series. While the competition for Xiaomi may have picked upin recent times. The note series have been consistently popular thanks to the excellent value for money aspect. The Note 9 pro sports a 6.67-inches LCD Display offering a resolution of 2400 x 1080 pixels and a pixel density of 395ppi. Under the hood, you get a 2.3 GHz octa-core Snapdragon 720G processor.
